From: Naeem Inamdar <Naeem.Inamdar@chalhoub.com> 
Sent: Tuesday, 27 May 2025 11:38 AM
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>; Sharon Pinto <Sharon.Pinto@chalhoub.com>
Cc: Retail Operations UAE <Retail.Operations.UAE@chalhoub.com>
Subject: Submission of Trade License and Insurance (PAR & Public Liability) - MEMO/MICC/B-4/2025/00000440-034

 

Dear Hagop / Sharon,

 

Could you please share the documents as requested by the mall management so that I can share the same with them to avoid penalties.

 

Regards

 

 

 

Attention To : Make Up For Ever / L’Occitane

 

CCMi - Submission of Trade License and Insurance (PAR & Public Liability)

 

Dear Tenant, 

 

You are requested to submit your store’s Valid Trade License and Insurance Certificates (Property All Risk + Public Liability Insurance) copies for City Centre Mirdif as part of your obligation towards the lease agreement with Majid Al Futtaim Properties on a yearly basis without reminders.

chunks.text:
You are requested to submit your store’s Valid Trade License and Insurance Certificates (Property All Risk + Public Liability Insurance) copies for City Centre Mirdif as part of your obligation towards the lease agreement with Majid Al Futtaim Properties on a yearly basis without reminders.

We would appreciate your urgent attention to this and look forward to receiving the updated documents asap.

 

Kindly reply to this MEMO with mirdifcentreadministrator@maf.ae <mailto:mirdifcentreadministrator@maf.ae>  in CC to this memo.

 

Note: Failure to observe this provision of the contract will be considered a non-compliance to the terms stipulated in the lease agreement and will result in automatic penalties and per day fines imposed on the store without further notice and non-compliance can be subject to prosecution under UAE law.

 

Regards,

Deena Fernandez
Senior Associate, Marketing
Mall Marketing

 

NAEEM INAMDAR

ASSOCIATE ‑ RSO

ALLIED ENTERPRISES LLC

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

+971 4 563 2600

	
 

 <https://chalhoubgroup.com/> 

CHALHOUBGROUP.COM <http://www.chalhoubgroup.com/> 

‑
